direct_enhancements.reason: Both methods add options to the Options instance, with addRequiredOption specifically setting the option as required.
Both methods handle the addition of options with similar parameter structures and control flows, differing only in the requirement setting.
Both methods manage the required options list, with addOptionGroup handling groups of options that can be required.
Both methods involve checking for the existence of options, which can lead to similar exception handling scenarios.
Both methods interact with the option storage maps (shortOpts and longOpts), suggesting similar resource access patterns.
